summary: The diff implements all four requirements (REQ-49 through REQ-53) with strong coverage. useAppState.ts has the correct Screen union, initialState, and go() function. App.tsx has the exact 'explorer' case. ExplorerScreen.tsx has the PROS_DEMO array with all 6 entries and the required layout. FicheProScreen.tsx has the null guard. A few minor items in REQ-51 are uncertain due to truncation but appear largely implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: TabBarClient must be in natural flex flow, never position:fixed, with flexShrink:0
missing_requirements.reason: The ExplorerScreen.tsx diff is truncated and does not show the TabBarClient rendering section. Cannot confirm it is rendered in natural flex flow with flexShrink:0 and not position:fixed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Filter pill labeled 'All' as first filter option
missing_requirements.reason: The FILTERS array in ExplorerScreen.tsx uses 'Tous' (French) rather than 'All' as the first filter label. The spec explicitly lists 'All / Flash / Barber / Coiffure / Esthetique / Massage'.

hallucinated_features.description: Booking1Screen, Booking2Screen, Booking3Screen, and Booking4Screen are fully implemented as separate screen files with complete multi-step booking flows
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request lists adding new screens as a non-goal and the fix scope only covers ExplorerScreen, FicheProScreen, App.tsx, and useAppState.ts. The diff shows four fully implemented booking screens beyond the stated fix scope.
